description: The transferFrom function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The transfer function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The approve function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's allowance to any value.
The totalSupply function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the total supply of tokens.
The balanceOf function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for a user's balance.
